item.title: DeepSolution: Boosting Complex Engineering Solution Design via Tree-based Exploration and Bi-point Thinking
item.description: DeepSolution enhances engineering design via tree exploration and bi-point thinking.

item.title: DeepRAG: Thinking to Retrieval Step by Step for Large Language Models
item.description: DeepRAG enhances LLM reasoning by strategically integrating retrieval, modeled as an MDP, improving accuracy by 21.99% and retrieval efficiency.
